Uses of Class
com.dougnoel.sentinel.exceptions.SentinelException

Packages that use SentinelException 
Package Description
com.dougnoel.sentinel.exceptions
Package to store all of our custom exceptions.
com.dougnoel.sentinel.steps
Generic step definitions.

  • Uses of SentinelException in com.dougnoel.sentinel.exceptions

    Subclasses of SentinelException in com.dougnoel.sentinel.exceptions 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  AccessDeniedException  
    class  ConfigurationMappingException  
    class  ConfigurationNotFoundException  
    class  ConfigurationParseException  
    class  ElementNotFoundException
    Thrown when an element is not found.
    class  ElementNotVisibleException
    Thrown when an element is not currently visible on a web page when the automation is attempting to interact with it.
    class  ElementTypeMismatchException
    Thrown if an Element is accessed as a type other than it is.
    class  FileNotFoundException  
    class  IOException  
    class  MalformedSelectorException
    Thrown when a selector locator string does not exist.
    class  MalformedURLException  
    class  NoSuchActionException
    Thrown when an attempt is made to instantiate an Action object that is not defined for the given API object.
    class  NoSuchColumnException
    Thrown when a column requested in a table doesn't exist.
    class  NoSuchElementException
    Thrown if an Element does not exist on a webpage.
    class  NoSuchFrameException
    SentinelException to handle a caught selenium NoSuchFrameException
    class  NoSuchSelectorException
    Thrown when a selector type does not exist.
    class  NoSuchWindowException  
    class  PageNotFoundException  
    class  PageObjectNotFoundException  
    class  URLNotFoundException  
    class  WebDriverException  
    class  WebDriverNotExecutableException
    Thrown when a webdriver is not executable.

    Methods in com.dougnoel.sentinel.steps that throw SentinelException 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void BaseSteps.click​(java.lang.String elementName)
    Clicks the element that matches the given elementName as defined on the current Page object.
    static void AccountSteps.fillAccountInfoIntoUsernameAndPasswordFields​(java.lang.String usernameField, java.lang.String passwordField)
    Looks up the default account in the page object yaml file based on the environment and enters the user name and password information into the specified fields.
    static void AccountSteps.fillAccountInfoIntoUsernameAndPasswordFields​(java.lang.String account, java.lang.String usernameField, java.lang.String passwordField)
    Looks up the given account in the page object yaml file based on the environment and enters the user name and password information into the specified fields.
    static void AccountSteps.fillPasswordField​(java.lang.String passwordField)
    Looks up the default account in the page object yaml file based on the environment and enters the password information into the specified field.
    static void AccountSteps.fillPasswordField​(java.lang.String account, java.lang.String passwordField)
    Looks up the given account in the page object yaml file based on the environment and enters the password information into the specified field.
    static void AccountSteps.fillUsernameField​(java.lang.String usernameField)
    Looks up the default account in the page object yaml file based on the environment and enters the user name information into the specified field.
    static void AccountSteps.fillUsernameField​(java.lang.String account, java.lang.String usernameField)
    Looks up the given account in the page object yaml file based on the environment and enters the user name information into the specified field.
    void APISteps.i_use_an_API​(java.lang.String apiName)
    Creates or retrieves an API with the given name for a determined UID.
    static void BaseSteps.naviagteToPage​(java.lang.String pageName)
    Overloaded method for navigating to a page object's url based on the current environment, so that nulls do not need to be passed.
    static void BaseSteps.naviagteToPage​(java.lang.String pageName, java.lang.String arguments)
    Overloaded method for navigating to a page object's url based on the current environment, and taking a query string argument it will append to the request.
    static void BaseSteps.navigateToPage​(java.lang.String pageName, java.lang.String hasArguments, java.lang.String arguments)
    Loads a page based on the environment you are currently testing.
    static void SelectSteps.selectItemFromElement​(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String elementName)
    Selects the given option in the select element, then stores the selected value in the Configuration Manager using the element name as the key.
    static void SelectSteps.selectOrdinalItemFromElement​(java.lang.String ordinal, java.lang.String elementName)
    Selects the ordinal option on the element and then stores the text value of that selection in the Configuration Manager using the element name as the key.
